other_tests.findings: Lymphocytosis consisting of a monoclonal population of Vg9/Vd1, g/d T cells of mature phenotype was detected. One proviral integration site was found in the LMO-2 locus.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The patientâ€™s lymphocyte count rose to 300,000 per cubic millimeter between 30 and 34 months after gene therapy.

other_tests.date: Between 30 and 34 months after gene therapy
other_tests.findings: Presence of a t(6;13) translocation was noted, which had not been detected 30 months after therapy.
Initiation of a chemotherapy regimen based on a high-risk protocol for acute lymphocytic leukemia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Resulted in a dramatic reduction in the abnormal cells.
